Human.Description: +2 Charisma when pure, -2 Resisting Curses when pure

Elf.Description: animals are friendlier +2 to rolls to calm animals, but you are fragile

Dwarf.Description: you can take a beating, but have -2 on fleeing

Halfling.Description: Eat less, +1 to dodging attacks and disease, -1 on trap rolls, Fragile

Kobold.Description: you gain access to sacred ground, and get advantage on combat and trap rolls in it, but your small frame renders some weapons too heavy

Gnoll.Description: everyone hates you, but when you see a fellow Gnoll get hurt, you get advantage on your next action

Spider.Description: You have a subspecies, and do more damage, but without magic you can't pick things up larger then a ring, you also get a subspecies specific venom, and access to the Hive

Snake.Description: you gain access to the library, you are naturally adapted to magic, getting advantage against it and with it, but no limbs, you also get venom

Ratfolk.Description: You will always get diseased when there is a chance, but it affects them differently, the more diseased a Ratfolk gets, the more deadly they are, but the more unstable too, you need more food, but rats are friendly

Kenku.Description: Can only mimic remembered speech, but always identifies trapped chests

Tiefling.Description: Fiends are more friendly, +2 to resisting curse, Holy is bad for you

Freak.Description: start with 0-2 upsides and 1-2 downsides, appearance varies

Goblin.Description: Trap Rooms are replaced with a random other room at the beginning of each day, all rare items when found are found as their common counterparts

Lizardfork.Description: Poisons and Venoms duration halved, Drug and Potion durations doubled, barter skills suffer, Technology skills suffer

God-Touched.Description: Gain Plus 3 to all roles when not Oathed or Religious, but immediately bind to the first religion or oath seen, gaining other benefits and downsides

Raptor.Description: You have access to hidden nests and tunnels, Agility, which for a turn you dodge all attacks, but your mental abilities will be most of the time shot, and instincts will control some of your life, you will forget complex things easily.
